description:
Lum starts attending Tomobiki High, but finds herself having a few problems with an eccentric teacher and the overly dramatic captain of the girls` volleyball team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanawa-sensei Toujou! Kore ga Seishun Da ne
Teacher Hanawa`s Arrival! Such is Youth!
花和先生登場! これが青春だね
